mapper.select: select video_idx, title, thumbnail, file, date_format(wdate, '%y-%m-%d') as wdate_d, hit from video_tbl order by video_idx desc limit 0, 5
select video_idx, title, thumbnail, file, date_format(wdate, '%y-%m-%d') as wdate_d, hit from video_tbl order by video_idx desc
select video_idx, title, thumbnail, file, date_format(wdate, '%y-%m-%d') as wdate_d, hit from video_tbl where title like concat('%', #{search_value}, '%') order by video_idx desc;
select video_idx, title, video_source, file, content, date_format(wdate, '%y-%m-%d') as wdate_d, hit from video_tbl where video_idx=#{video_idx}
mapper.update: update video_tbl set hit = hit+1 where video_idx=#{video_idx}
mapper.insert: insert into video_tbl(title, video_source, content, file) values (#{title}, #{video_source}, #{content}, #{file})
mapper.select: select video_idx, title, video_source, content from video_tbl where video_idx=#{video_idx}
mapper.update: update video_tbl set title = #{title}, video_source = #{video_source}, content = #{content} where video_idx=#{video_idx};
